entry.title: Midnight Fire; The Last Dragonlord
entry.summary:
Author: Vivirki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,313Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 129

Summary: After Camleot is overrun by Morgause's army and Morgana is revealed to be a spy, Merlin is forced to free The Great Dragon. He gives him the answer he seeks yet takes something much larger, as the citadel is weak he takes the opportunity and kills Uther Pendragon.Arthur, overcome with loss begins searching for the only man who can help him defeat The Great Dragon, the last Dragonlord. What they find, however, is much more than either Merlin or Arthur expected. In the shadow of that cruel night, Merlin must face the truth of his heritage and hide it from his best friend, the new king of Camelot.

entry.title: How To Train Your Prat
entry.summary:
Author: lainisthenameiamcurrentlyusing

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,543Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 5

Summary: Arthur is the crown prince of Camelot, and Merlin is his insufferable servant... always annoying, always underfoot, and always making things harder than they need to be. A stolen blanket, a clumsy dance lesson, and a near-kiss during a battle are just the beginning. What starts as irritation soon grows into something far more complicated... and neither of them knows how to stop it. "Wouldn’t have to if you weren’t hoarding them like some sort of linen dragon." Arthur looked deeply, personally offended. "I am not-" He shook his head, as if physically trying to rid himself of the sheer audacity of the accusation. "Royalty is entitled to blanket privileges!" "Oh, I see," Merlin said, voice dry. "So your royal posterior requires five whole blankets while the rest of us freeze to death?" Arthur narrowed his eyes. "It’s not the number, it’s the principle." Merlin raised an eyebrow. "The principle of being a royal prat?" Written for u/Normal-Extent-6100 on reddit <3

entry.title: Lost in Translation
entry.summary:
Author: Merlinfirstlastalways

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,068Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: Whatever magic Merlin had done to teach him the language was working fast, but not fast enough. There were still awkward moments when his brain sort of stuttered as it tried to make sense of something very new. He understood magazine and lawn chair and sun hat and trees and modern, but the marks on Merlin’s shirt were still a mystery to him. Eventually, his mind stuttered again, and he almost understood.

entry.title: Unbound
entry.summary:
Author: Orpheeeeus

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,391Chapters: 4/9Kudos: 107

Summary: The wind whispers to those who listen, as do the rain and the worms. They whisper of a foolish king and a merciless deity. They whisper about the slow decay of the world and the rebirth of all things.They whisper that, during the Great Purge, Uther trapped a being no mortal was ever meant to trap. He bound it in the deepest cave of his kingdom and atop the highest peak of his land.And the rain whispers: fear not, for only mortals remain bound forever. The seasons will come and go, the world will freeze and the snow will melt. And one day, Emrys will be free once more. Magic will walk the Earth anew.◊◊ ◊◊ ◊◊Arthur is in love. Merlin is tired. And Mordred will free Emrys, no matter the cost.[Emrys revealed - Good!Mordred]

Summary: TW: EXTREME GORE/GRAPHIC RAPE. DEAD DOVE. DO NOT EAT.(Cover photo shows a bit of blood.)At 14, Arthur endures brutal torture in pointless human experiments by extremely attractive, human-like aliens. Among them is prodigy 16-year-old Merlin, a cruel alien boy scientist who quickly becomes twistedly obsessed with Arthur. Arthur is soon purchased as a pet by Merlin and removed from the lab, where Merlin is determined to break him down and mold him into someone who will return his affections, no matter how many millennia it takes. Arthur clings desperately to his hatred as the last part of his identity.He refuses to give in to Stockholm Syndrome.(This fic is disgusting, horrid, the most frightening thing you've consumed this year. entry.title: Wooden Dragons
entry.summary:
Author: CaffeinatedFlumadiddle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,491Chapters: 7/15Kudos: 736

Summary: “You-” Ygraine said, stepping up to point a finger in Uther’s face. “You are a liar and a murderer. The fact you think someone as sweet and caring as Vivienne is destined to marry you is a tragedy in itself, but if you expect me to hand over my brother’s rightful claim to Camelot’s throne-”“My claim to Camelot’s throne,” Uther threw back, face growing more red as Arthur looked between his parents in utter bewilderment. Merlin didn’t blame him. He had envisioned Uther and Ygraine’s love story to be more… well, less based in war and battles.Ygraine’s eyes narrowed as she grabbed a goblet of wine and threw it in Uther’s face. A few of the guards shifted, but Uther only raised a hand to pause them, spitting out the wine with furious eyes.“You,” Ygraine said coldly. “Are unworthy to sit upon a stool, let alone a throne.”From a few feet away, Balinor scoffed as he sipped from his own goblet. “I kind of like having her as a hostage, Uther. She livens up the place.”OrIn a desperate attempt to save Arthur at Camlann, Merlin tries to reverse time. It works perhaps a tad too well.

entry.title: last hope
entry.summary:
Author: annesbonny

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,192Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 60

Summary: The first time Merlin knew he was cursed, was the day he turned thirteen. This, like most things from then on in his life, was considered to be an omen of things to come.  Prince Merlin of Gwynedd is the latest in a long line of princes affected by a mysterious curse. Prince Arthur is duty bound to protect his people from a harsh winter, any way he can. An arranged marriage between the two princes surely can't go wrong...OR: An arranged marriage AU with a twist loosely inspired by a bit of Welsh mythology

entry.title: Of Nonchanters and Sorcerers
entry.summary:
Author: Electric_Dream

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,876Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 127

Summary: Sequel to Of Sorcerers and Nonchanters BBC Merlin but not like you know it.A role reversal.What if not having magic was illegal?What if Merlin was the prince instead of Arthur?What if Arthur was Merlin’s manservant?How would all of this change the story that we all know and love.*** Mordred had gotten what he had wanted.He had spread his hatred, his death and his destruction, killing and tearing down those that were in his way to the throne. He had slain countless of innocents including Ygraine, a loss that lay heavy inside of Arthur’s chest. He was barely holding on since his return to the world of the living he was sure that soon he was going to break. However, he was not going to let anyone see, he had to be strong, he had to be stoic and he had to be brave. He was Arthur Pendragon, the supposed King of a broken kingdom and supposed king of a dying race. The weight was on his shoulders and he did not have time to stop and think. If he did that, he probably will never return to his feet again. At least not whole..There was a great fight ahead of them that they were going to have to be ready for.No matter what.

entry.title: the true physics of all things pathetic
entry.summary:
Author: deniigiq

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,988Chapters: 5/8Kudos: 84

Summary: “I know it sounds ridiculous,” Arthur says. “But I can’t stop thinking about him, Guinevere. It’s like I can feel him. His heart right here.”He lays his palm over his chest and holds it there. On an impulse, Gwen joins him. Arthur lets his hand fall so that hers can spread out over the thin layer of linen over his skin, and that’s when she feels it.Arthur’s heart beats in the usual rhythm, but there is a flutter there, too.No, not just a flutter, a full beat between the others and behind it.Arthur lifts his face to hers, and Gwen has never been more thankful that he cannot see the horror spreading rapidly across her own. (To prevent Arthur's death at the Battle of Camlann, Merlin makes a magical exchange - he gives Arthur his heart in exchange for Arthur's sight. Arthur makes it home, but Merlin doesn't, so Gwen sets out to find him and bring him home, only to discover that Merlin isn't exactly the person she thought him to be.)
